account: You must call customer service at 877-797-1696 to get your account number - it is NOT listed anywhere on your online account.

account: Account number can be found on your monthly statement from Family Mobile.

addressRequired:
See Notes section for required info

https://www.myfamilymobile.com/Support/DeviceSupport/DeviceSupport.aspx?supporttype=NUMBERTRANSFER
notes:
Required Information:
In order for Family Mobile to properly process your request to transfer a phone number, you must first provide the below information for the account yoyu are transferring from:
-Name as is appears on the bill from original carrier
-SSN associated with original account (if applicable)
-Billing account number
-Account Password or PIN from original account (only if applicable)
If any of this information is incorrect or not provided, the transfer will be delayed.

account: The account number can be found by logging into your account at flashwireless.com

notes:
The FreedomPop Porting Department does NOT work on the weekends - Please allow 2 to 4 days for the number to be released.

If you like your FreedomPop service after a month, you're definitely able to port in then too! Whenever you want to you can go to My Account » Phone number and then you can enter your number to port in. You can wait as long as you need to port in

account: The account number is your phone number (including area code)
pin: The passcode is your 4-digit PIN - if you are not sure what that is call Go Smart Customer Service at 1-877-582-7788.
notes:
You'll need to have the following information handy from your original service provider when you activate:

Your account number (you can find this on a bill or by calling your original service provider)
PIN/Password (this helps us protect your account and prevent someone not on the account from transferring your number)

account:

pin: The password with be provided when you cancel service. It will be available in a notification on the Project Fi app and website.

account: The Account number is NOT listed on your bill. You will need to call Ultra Mobile Customer Service Department at 888-777-0446 to get your "porting account number.

account: The Account number for porting purposes is NOT the one listed on your bill. You will need to call the US Cellular Porting Department at 888-900-7678 to get your "porting account number.
pin: The passcode is your 4 digit PIN.

account: The account number can be found on your most recent bill and usually ends in 00001.
pin: The passcode is "call-in" passcode when you call customer service. It is usually the last 4 digits of your social security number (unless you specifically changed it to something else). Customer Service Number is 800-922-0204.
notes: Also, NEVER port the PRIMARY number first - always port your secondary number(s) FIRST!!

account: Account Number is 10 digits, a dash ( - ) and 00001

account: Need to contact Virgin Mobile customer service to get 9-digit account number
pin: Passcode is usually the customer’s birthday in 6-digit format unless changed to something else.

account: Your account number can be found on an old bill or your previous carrier's website.
pin: A PIN is required by your old carrier to process your number transfer. Look for yours on an old bill or by giving them a call.
